ManSection.Description: The intention of these function is to create stand-alone pdf and html files using AutoDoc without having them associated to a package. It uses the same optional records as the &AutoDoc; command itself, but instead of a package name there should be a filename or a list of filenames containing AutoDoc text from which the documents are created. Please see the &AutoDoc; command for more information about this and have a look at for a simple worksheet example.
